Jellyfin Media Server

← Back to Documentation

Overview

Jellyfin is a free, open-source media server that provides an alternative to Plex. It offers similar functionality with a focus on privacy and user control, with no tracking or premium features.

Features

  • Open Source: Completely free with no premium tiers
  • Privacy Focused: No tracking or data collection
  • Web Interface: Access directly through your browser
  • Multiple Format Support: Plays almost any video/audio format
  • User Profiles: Individual accounts with personalized libraries
  • Live TV Support: Stream live television (when available)
  • Plugin System: Extend functionality with community plugins

Jellyfin vs Plex

Choose Jellyfin if you prefer:

  • Open-source software
  • No external account dependencies
  • Complete privacy (no data sent to external servers)
  • Customizable interface
  • No premium features or limitations

Choose Plex if you prefer:

  • More polished mobile apps
  • Better transcoding performance
  • Easier remote access setup
  • More third-party integrations

How to Access

Step 1: Request Access

  1. Email jellyfin@pez.solutions
  2. Include your desired username
  3. Briefly introduce yourself (optional)

Step 2: Receive Credentials

  1. You'll receive an auto-generated password via email
  2. Access is typically granted within 1 hour

Step 3: First Login

  1. Visit jellyfin.pez.solutions
  2. Log in with your username and provided password
  3. Change your password to something memorable (recommended)

Supported Devices

  • Web Browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge
  • Mobile Apps: iOS, Android (Jellyfin Mobile)
  • Smart TVs: Android TV, Samsung Tizen, LG WebOS
  • Streaming Devices: Roku, Apple TV, Chromecast
  • Desktop: Windows, macOS, Linux (Jellyfin Media Player)
  • Kodi: Via Jellyfin for Kodi plugin

Content Library

Our Jellyfin server mirrors our Plex content, including:

  • Latest movie releases
  • Current and classic TV shows
  • Documentary collections
  • International and anime content
  • Music library (when available)

Interface Overview

Main Features

  • Home: Recently added and continue watching
  • Movies: Browse the complete movie library
  • TV Shows: Browse shows by series
  • Search: Find content by title, actor, or genre
  • Favorites: Mark content as favorites for quick access
  • Playlists: Create custom playlists

Customization

Jellyfin offers several customization options:

  • Themes: Choose from different visual themes
  • Display Settings: Adjust layout and information shown
  • Playback Settings: Configure video quality and subtitles
  • User Settings: Personalize your experience

Request New Content

Request movies or TV shows through our Jellyfin request system. Content is typically added within 24-48 hours if available.

Troubleshooting

Common Issues

  • Video won't play: Try a different browser or clear browser cache
  • Buffering issues: Reduce video quality in playback settings
  • Login problems: Check username/password and try password reset
  • Subtitle issues: Try different subtitle tracks or disable/enable
  • Mobile app problems: Update to latest version or try web interface

Support

For issues with our Jellyfin server, contact support@pez.solutions. For general Jellyfin questions, visit the official Jellyfin documentation.
